venue.name: RISQUE at An Tua Nua

item.description:
BachataDVD.com Presents.....
The Blazing Bachata Boot Camp Workshop International Tour
Saturday Feb 14, 2009
1-5pm


We JUST found out there will be some guest instructors from DC teaching a Bachata workshop this weekend! I don't believe a Bachata bootcamp has been done before here, so don't miss out on this. It should be LOTS of fun. THEN join everyone after at the Knights of Columbus to get your Salsa, Merengue, and Bachata groove on for Edwin Pabon's Annual Valentine's Day Party! Evening Party Info: http://www.facebook.c...


BACHATA WORKSHOP INFO:

Workshops Location:
An Tua Nua
835 Beacon St
( 1 block from Kenmore Square toward Brookline)
Boston, MA 02215-3303
For Directions: 617 262-2121

Cost:
$20 per workshop
All 4 Workshops for $50
Couple Valentine's Day Discount $85 for all 4 Workshops MEET UP DISCOUNT
Register online through meetup or call 703.599.3018 to get couples discount or pay by cash/check.


Register today! Don't miss this opportunity to learn from Lee "El Gringuito" & Nohelia right here in Boston! Pay online through meetup today, or call today to take advantage of the special couple MEETUP discount. 703.599.3018


Workshops!!!


Lee & Nohelia have taught over 100,000 people in 47 States how to dance Bachata in The USA!


"You can't find a better class, from barely holding hands to drop-dead dirty moves to get your pulse pounding."

-- Washington Post


Lee "El Gringuito" has taught more people to dance Bachata in the United States than anyone in the World! He has been seen on the final episodes of Americas Got Talent, Fox Television, Ambush Makeover, Telemundo and Univision. Get ready for amazing lessons that will take your Bachata to the next level! Together with his beautiful wife Nohelia they are traveling around the country in 2009. Workshop dates have been scheduled in Reno, San Francisco, Milwaukee, DC, Baltimore, Honolulu, Charlotte, and the UK. Their four hour workshop, Latin Dance Show, and DJ Experience will leave you wanting more!


Workshop Description 4x 50 Minute Workshops
Bachata Foundation/Dominican Style Bachata - 1pm - 2pm

Get ready to learn a great foundation of moves including Bachata motion, turns, half turns and Dominican motion. This class sets the foundation of the entire workshop. This workshop focuses on material taught on our Level I Bachata DVD.

Bachata Hot Combinations - 2pm - 3pm

Get ready to learn amazing Signature Lee "El Gringuito" Bachata moves. This class will utilize many of the principles taught in Bachata Foundations. You will start to develop your Domincan Style Bachata step with moves like La Dominicana and then be ready for exciting combinations like Extreme Bachata. This workshop focuses on moves taught on our Level II Bachata DVD.


Bridging the Gap Between Bachata & Salsa- 3pm - 4pm


In this class you will learn how to take Salsa combinations and convert them into Bachata moves. Both dances share some basic musicalities. You will learn a number of Salsa combinations and then we will convert them into Hot Bachata Moves


Bachata Tricks and Dips 4pm - 5pm

Get ready to Spice Up Your Bachata with amazing tricks and dips. This "LA Style Flair" can be added at key moments in songs to give that extra "punch." You will learn Bachata Dip, Tango Lift and Dip and Hypnotic Bachata! We will also dicuss safety and common elements among moves. This workshop focuses on moves taught on our Level III Bahata DVD.


Followed by:


Enrollment Fee:


$20 per class per person - All four classes for $50.


COUPLES VALENTINE'S Day Special

4 Classes $85 (two people)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Lee! He will direct you to other meetup members!
